title: Multi person assistance problem
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System:ubuntu 18.04
*   Python Version Used:3.8
*   When you install doccano:1.8.2
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc):pip install doccano
*

In the process of multi person assistance, if user1 and user2 click the next piece of data at the same time, two people will repeatedly mark a piece of data. This problem occurs frequently when there are many people.

It is hoped that a mark can be added to indicate that someone is editing this piece of data when someone is marking it. Or it can provide other ways to cooperate, such as customizing the number of tags assigned to personnel in the form of data allocation
